scenario_text.value: What’s up, Minoru? Find anything?
Nope, not at all...
I figured we’d have better luck here...
Hey, let’s...
Take a break.
Look a bit longer.
Actually get serious?

Let’s take a little break. Pushing anymore
will just wear us out.

Are you sure? We don’t have much time,
if we don’t hurry...

What’s the point in finding the Holy
Beast if we’re exhausted?
Plus, one way or another up until now...

We were able to find the Holy Beast.
That’s why we’ll definitely do it again.
...Yeah, okay. Let’s take a little rest.

I agree to this course of action. A rest is
sure to makes certain things more visible.
Thanks, Takuma.

Let’s look a bit longer. We should be able to
find them if we stick it out.

Yeah, you’re right. C’mon, Falcomon, let’s
put our elbows into it!
Indeed. Let’s continue our search.
How about we actually search seriously?

I am being serious!
What’s with that tone?!
Sorry, sorry. I was just kidding.

Even if you say so...
It really rustled my jimmies.

I think it’s fine. It’s just Takuma’s way of
showing concern.
Sure, but...

Ah, forget it. Let’s get back to the hunt for
now.
Later. Yell if you find anything!
Hmm... This area looks suspicious to me.

I trust your gut, Falcomon.
Lets take another look around here.

Still... If my instincts are wrong, and we
waste precious time...

I don’t really mind, man. If it were just me,
I’d be wandering around aimlessly anyway.

...Ho, I see. In that case, let’s look around
here once more.
(I can leave this area to them.)
